attributes.action: give more funding to the creation and maintenance of childrens play areas within the community.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If our children are not able to test them selves through play, then they will often seek other ways which often leads to crime.  It is natural for a child to play, and some of our play areas in this country are very poor and not maintained by local goverment; even though they say they do.  Please sign this petition for our children
